SwiftMessageFormat.name: MT576
SwiftMessageFormat.Description:
This message is sent by an executing party, eg, a broker-dealer, which has accepted one or several orders to buy or sell financial instruments, to an instructing party, eg, a client, or its authorised agent. Where permitted, it may also be sent by a point of execution, eg, an exchange, to list open orders.
This message identifies, as at a specific date, orders which have not yet been legally agreed or fully executed. It may include all open orders or selected open orders by financial instrument in all or selected safekeeping accounts or sub-accounts.

Validation.Comment: Continuation Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T97) :

Code.Name: LAST
Code.Description: Last page of a statement with more than one page.

Code.Name: MORE
Code.Description: Intermediate page of a statement which contains additional pages.

Code.Name: ONLY
Code.Description: Only page of the statement.

Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Function must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T86) :

Code.Name: CANC
Code.Description: Message requesting the cancellation of a previously sent message.

Code.Name: NEWM
Code.Description: New message.

Validation.Comment: When present, Subfunction must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): T85) :

Code.Name: CODU
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes and the message is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Code.Name: COPY
Code.Description: Message is a copy to a party other than the account owner/account servicer, for information purposes.

Code.Name: DUPL
Code.Description: Message is for information/confirmation purposes. It is a duplicate of a message previously sent.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
UTC Indicator must be a valid time expressed as HH[MM] (Error code(s): T39) .
Sign must not be used when UTC Indicator is equal to all zeroes (Error code(s): T14) .
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)
Proprietary code (Format Option R) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. (Error code(s): T26) .
In option B, when Data Source Scheme is not present, Account Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K97) :

Code.Name: ABRD
Code.Description: Financial instruments are held in a safekeeping account abroad.

Code.Name: CEND
Code.Description: Financial instruments are centralised in one location.

Code.Name: DVPA
Code.Description: Safekeeping account is used for settlement on delivery or collect on delivery basis.

Code.Name: FUNG
Code.Description: Financial instruments in the safekeeping account are fungible.

Code.Name: MARG
Code.Description: Account is used when financing is by the broker/dealer.

Code.Name: NFUN
Code.Description: Financial instruments in the safekeeping account are not fungible.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Financial instruments in the safekeeping account are in physical form.

Code.Name: SHOR
Code.Description: Account is used for short sale orders.

Validation.Comment: Flag must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K17) :

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes.

Option.Name: B
Option.Specification: (Identification Of Security)(Description Of Security) |(Description Of Security)

Validation.Comment: Narrative must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
In option B, if Data Source Scheme is not present, Place Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K94) :

Code.Name: EXCH
Code.Description: Place of listing is a stock exchange.

Code.Name: OTCO
Code.Description: Place of listing is over the counter.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is CFRE, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: ANNU
Code.Description: Frequency is annual.

Code.Name: MNTH
Code.Description: Frequency is monthly.

Code.Name: QUTR
Code.Description: Frequency is quarterly.

Code.Name: SEMI
Code.Description: Frequency is semi-annual.

Code.Name: WEEK
Code.Description: Frequency is weekly.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is FORM, Indicator must contain one of the following: (Error code(s): K22)

Code.Name: BEAR
Code.Description: Financial instruments are in bearer form.

Code.Name: REGD
Code.Description: Financial instruments are in registered form.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is MICO, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: A001
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for February, and provided that the interest period started on a 30th or a 31st. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th if the period started on a 30th or a 31st and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be a 28th (or 29th). It is the most commonly used 30/360 method for US straight and convertible bonds.

Code.Name: A002
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month in a way similar to the 30/360 (basic rule) and a 365-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for February. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be a 28th (or 29th).

Code.Name: A003
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month in a way similar to the 30/360 (basic rule) and the assumed number of days in a year in a way similar to the Actual/Actual (ICMA). Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for February. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be a 28th (or 29th). The assumed number of days in a year is computed as the actual number of days in the coupon period multiplied by the number of interest payments in the year.

Code.Name: A004
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days in the interest period and a 360-day year.

Code.Name: A005
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days in the interest period and a 365-day year.

Code.Name: A006
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days and the assumed number of days in a year, ie, the actual number of days in the coupon period multiplied by the number of interest payments in the year. If the coupon period is irregular (first or last coupon), it is extended or split into quasi interest periods that have the length of a regular coupon period and the computation is operated separately on each quasi interest period and the intermediate results are summed up.

Code.Name: A007
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be equivalent to a 30 Feb. However, if the last day of the maturity coupon period is the last day of February, it will not be assumed to be a 30th. It is a variation of the 30/360 (ICMA) method commonly used for eurobonds. The usage of this variation is only relevant when the coupon periods are scheduled to end on the last day of the month.

Code.Name: A008
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days of the interest period that fall on a normal year, divided by 365, added to the actual number of days of the interest period that fall on a leap year, divided by 366.

Code.Name: A009
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days and a 365-day year (if the coupon payment date is NOT in a leap year) or a 366-day year (if the coupon payment date is in a leap year).

Code.Name: A010
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days and a 366-day year (if 29 Feb falls in the coupon period) or a 365-day year (if 29 Feb does not fall in the coupon period). If a coupon period is longer than one year, it is split by repetitively separating full year sub-periods counting backwards from the end of the coupon period (a year backwards from a 28 Feb being 29 Feb, if it exists). The first of the sub-periods starts on the start date of the accrued interest period and thus is possibly shorter than a year. Then the interest computation is operated separately on each sub-period and the intermediate results are summed up.

Code.Name: A011
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for February. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be a 28th (or 29th). It is the most commonly used 30/360 method for non-US straight and convertible bonds issued before 01/01/1999.

Code.Name: A012
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month, except for the last day of February whose day of the month value shall be adapted to the value of the first day of the interest period if the latter is higher and if the period is one of a regular schedule. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28th Feb of a non-leap year is assumed to be equivalent to a 29th Feb when the first day of the interest period is a 29th, or to a 30th Feb when the first day of the interest period is a 30th or a 31st. The 29th Feb of a leap year is assumed to be equivalent to a 30th Feb when the first day of the interest period is a 30th or a 31st. Similarly, if the coupon period starts on the last day of February, it is assumed to produce only one day of interest in February as if it was starting on a 30th Feb when the end of the period is a 30th or a 31st, or two days of interest in February when the end of the period is a 29th, or 3 days of interest in February when it is the 28th Feb of a non-leap year and the end of the period is before the 29th.

Code.Name: A013
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on a 30-day month and a 360-day year. Accrued interest to a value date on the last day of a month shall be the same as to the 30th calendar day of the same month. This means that a 31st is assumed to be a 30th and the 28 Feb (or 29 Feb for a leap year) is assumed to be equivalent to a 30 Feb. It is a variation of the 30E/360 (or Eurobond basis) method where the last day of February is always assumed to be a 30th, even if it is the last day of the maturity coupon period.

Code.Name: A014
Code.Description: Method whereby interest is calculated based on the actual number of accrued days in the interest period, excluding any leap day from the count, and a 365-day year.

Code.Name: OTHR
Code.Description: Other method than A001-A014 . See Narrative.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is PAYS, Indicator must contain one of the following: (Error code(s): K22)

Code.Name: FULL
Code.Description: Financial instrument is fully paid.

Code.Name: NILL
Code.Description: Financial instrument is nil paid.

Code.Name: PART
Code.Description: Financial instrument is partially paid.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is PFRE, Indicator must contain one of the following: (Error code(s): K22)

Code.Name: ANNU
Code.Description: Payment frequency is annual.

Code.Name: MNTH
Code.Description: Payment frequency is monthly.

Code.Name: QUTR
Code.Description: Payment frequency is quarterly.

Code.Name: SEMI
Code.Description: Payment frequency is semi-annual.

Code.Name: WEEK
Code.Description: Payment frequency is weekly.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is OPST, Instrument Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K12) :

Code.Name: AMER
Code.Description: Option can be exercised before or on expiry date.

Code.Name: EURO
Code.Description: Option can be exercised on expiry date only.

Validation.Comment: If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is OPTI, Instrument Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K12) :

Code.Name: CALL
Code.Description: A right to buy a defined quantity of an asset by a certain date at an agreed price.

Code.Name: PUTO
Code.Description: A right to sell a defined quantity of an asset by a certain date at an agreed price.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .

Validation.Qualifiers: CALD, CONV, COUP, DDTE, EXPI, FCOU, FRNR, ISSU, MATU, NWFC, PUTT
Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .

Validation.Qualifiers: CUFC, INDX, INTR, NWFC, NXRT, PRFC, YTMR
Validation.Comment: When Sign is present, Rate must not be zero (Error code(s): T14) .
Number (Format Option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .

Validation.Qualifiers: CALL, CONV, COVE, FRNF, ODDC, PUTT, WRTS
Validation.Comment: Flag must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K17) :

Code.Name: N
Code.Description: No.

Code.Name: Y
Code.Description: Yes.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
In option A, Percentage Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points below par, for example, a discount price of 2.0% equals a price of 98 when par is 100.

Code.Name: PRCT
Code.Description: Price expressed as a percentage of par.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points above par, for example, a premium price of 2.0% equals a price of 102 when par is 100.

Code.Name: YIEL
Code.Description: Price expressed as a yield.

Validation.Comment: In option B, Amount Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: ACTU
Code.Description: Price expressed as an amount of currency per unit or per share.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as a discount amount.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as a premium.

Validation.Comment: When Sign is present, Price must not be zero (Error code(s): T14).
If Qualifier is MINO or Qualifier is SIZE, Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K36):

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, ie, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares.

Validation.Comment: When Qualifier is ORGV Quantity Type Code must contain (Error code(s): K36):

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, that is, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .

Qualifier.Name: REMI
Qualifier.Description: Quantity of Financial Instrument Remaining on Order

Validation.Comment: Quantity Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K36) :

Code.Name: AMOR
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the current amortised face amount of a bond, for example, a periodic reduction/increase of a bond's principal amount.

Code.Name: FAMT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as an amount representing the face amount, ie, the principal, of a debt instrument.

Code.Name: UNIT
Code.Description: Quantity expressed as a number, eg, a number of shares.

Validation.Comment: The number of digits following the comma must not exceed the maximum allowed for the specified currency (Error code(s): C03,T40,T43) .
When Sign is present, Amount must not be zero (Error code(s): T14) .
Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52) .
Number (Format option B) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .

Validation.Qualifiers: ALMR, BASK, BMRB, INDX, ISSU, LIST, MAST, PREV, PROG, RELA
Validation.Comment: Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
In option A, Percentage Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points below par, for example, a discount price of 2.0% equals a price of 98 when par is 100.

Code.Name: PRCT
Code.Description: Price expressed as a percentage of par.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as the number of percentage points above par, for example, a premium price of 2.0% equals a price of 102 when par is 100.

Code.Name: YIEL
Code.Description: Price expressed as a yield.

Validation.Comment: In option B, Amount Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K90):

Code.Name: ACTU
Code.Description: Price expressed as an amount of currency per unit or per share.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Price expressed as a discount amount.

Code.Name: PREM
Code.Description: Price expressed as a premium.

Validation.Comment: Currency Code must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (Error code(s): T52).
When Sign is present, Price must not be zero (Error code(s): T14)
If Data Source Scheme is not present and Qualifier is PRIC, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: COMB
Code.Description: Price is a combined expenses price (used in the UK market).

Code.Name: NDIS
Code.Description: Price is net to the client disclosed (used in the UK market).

Code.Name: NET1
Code.Description: Price is a net price, ie, net of all charges, taxes, or fees.

Code.Name: NET2
Code.Description: Price is a net price, ie, net only of local broker's commission, local fees, or local taxes.

Code.Name: NOGR
Code.Description: Price is notional gross (used in the UK market).

Code.Name: NUND
Code.Description: Price is net to the client undisclosed (used in the UK market).

Code.Name: PARV
Code.Description: Price is a par value or equal to the nominal or face value of the instrument.

Validation.Comment: In option H, if Qualifier is BUSE, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BUYI
Code.Description: Transaction is a purchase of financial instrument.

Code.Name: CROF
Code.Description: Transaction is a cross from (Funds Industry).

Code.Name: CROT
Code.Description: Transaction is a cross to (Funds Industry).

Code.Name: DIVR
Code.Description: Transaction is a reinvestment of dividend order (Funds Industry. Not to be used for corporate actions).

Code.Name: FPOO
Code.Description: Transaction is an FPO (Follow on Public Offer) bid or order.

Code.Name: IPOO
Code.Description: Transaction is an IPO (Initial Public Offering) bid or order.

Code.Name: IPPO
Code.Description: Transaction is an IPP (Institutional Placement Programme) bid or order.

Code.Name: REDM
Code.Description: Transaction is a redemption of funds.

Code.Name: SELL
Code.Description: Transaction is a sale of financial instrument.

Code.Name: SUBS
Code.Description: Transaction is a subscription to funds.

Code.Name: SWIF
Code.Description: Transaction is a change of an investment from one sub-fund to another sub-fund.

Code.Name: SWIT
Code.Description: Transaction is a change of an investment from one sub-fund to another sub-fund.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is COST and Data Source Scheme is not present,Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CLDI
Code.Description: Commission is as per client agreement.

Code.Name: FLAT
Code.Description: Commission is a flat fee.

Code.Name: PERN
Code.DetailedName: Percentage of Principal in Basis Points
Code.Description: Commission is a percentage of principal.

Code.Name: PERU
Code.Description: Commission is per unit of financial instrument.

Code.Name: PWCD
Code.DetailedName: Percentage Commission Waived as Cash Discount
Code.Description: Commission is a percentage commission waived as cash discount.

Code.Name: PWEU
Code.DetailedName: Percentage Commission Waived as Additional Units
Code.Description: Commission is a percentage commission waived as additional units.

Code.Name: SOFT
Code.Description: Commission is a soft dollar percentage commission.

Code.Name: STEP
Code.DetailedName: Commission Sharing Type is for Step-out Trade
Code.Description: Commission is for a step-out trade.

Validation.Comment: In option H, if Qualifier is PAYM, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: APMT
Code.Description: Against payment.

Code.Name: FREE
Code.Description: Free.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is REST and Data Source Scheme is not present,Indicator must contain one of the following (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: 144A
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of an unregistered security issued, pursuant to US legal restrictions 144A.

Code.Name: NRST
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of a security that is not subject to restrictions.

Code.Name: RSTR
Code.Description: Ownership or transfer of a security that is subject to restrictions, and not pursuant to 144A.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is TILI and Data Source Scheme is not present,Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: CLOS
Code.Description: Order to be executed at or around the closing price.

Code.Name: FIKI
Code.Description: Market or limit order that is to be executed in its entirety as soon as it is submitted; if not so executed, the order is to be cancelled.

Code.Name: GDAY
Code.Description: Order that, if not executed, expires at the end of the trading day on which the order is entered.

Code.Name: GTCA
Code.Description: Order that remains in effect until it is either executed or cancelled.

Code.Name: GTHD
Code.Description: Order that, if not executed, expires at the end of the specified expiry date.

Code.Name: GTMO
Code.Description: Order that, if not executed, expires at the end of the month on which the order is entered.

Code.Name: GTNM
Code.DetailedName: Good until the End of Next Month.
Code.Description: Order that, if not executed, expires at the end of next month.

Code.Name: GTXO
Code.Description: Order that remains in effect until crossed.

Code.Name: IOCA
Code.Description: Market or limit order to be executed in whole or in part as soon as it is submitted; any portion not so executed is to be cancelled.

Code.Name: OPEN
Code.Description: Market or limit order to be executed at the opening of the stock exchange or not at all; all or part of any order not executed at the opening is treated as cancelled.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is TOOR and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: ALNO
Code.Description: A round-lot market or limit-price order which must be executed in its entirety or not at all; unlike 'fill or kill', these orders are not cancelled if not executed as soon as received.

Code.Name: BCSE
Code.Description: Order to buy contra short exempt.

Code.Name: BCSH
Code.Description: Order to buy contra short.

Code.Name: BMIN
Code.Description: Order to buy at a price lower than the current market price. This is an order to buy a stated amount of a financial instrument provided that its price is not higher than the last sale if the last sale was a minus or zero minus tick, not higher than the last sale minus the minimum fractional change in the stock if the last sale was a plus or zero plus tick. The price limit indicates the highest price at which the order can be executed.

Code.Name: CARE
Code.Description: Order that is not to be executed as a whole because it may disturb the price.

Code.Name: COMB
Code.Description: Order that is linked to another order to buy or sell and must be executed as a unit, both or none, or cancelled as a unit.

Code.Name: DISC
Code.Description: Order where the executing broker or investment manager decides on the quantity or price.

Code.Name: DNIN
Code.Description: Limit order to buy or stop order to sell or stop limit order that is not to be increased in shares on the ex-dividend date as a result of a stock dividend or distribution.

Code.Name: DNRE
Code.Description: Limit order to buy or stop order to sell, or stop-limit order to sell that is not to be reduced in price by the amount of an ordinary cash dividend. Applies only to ordinary stock dividends; should be reduced for other distributions.

Code.Name: ICEB
Code.Description: Type of limit order whose overall quantity is not transparent to the market. Rather, only a client-defined part of the order is shown to the market (the 'tip of the iceberg'). Upon execution of the first 'tip' (i.e. partial execution to the client while for the market it does not appear to be a 'partial') the system releases the next 'tip' of the same size to the market until the 'iceberg' has been melted down successfully. Different from a usual care order.

Code.Name: LIWI
Code.Description: Order to be executed at a limit price, with a round-lot (or board-lot) sales; valid only for odd lot orders.

Code.Name: LIWO
Code.Description: Order to be executed at a limit price, without a round-lot (or board-lot) sales; valid only for odd lot orders.

Code.Name: LMTO
Code.Description: Order to buy at the indicated price limit or lower or an order to sell at the indicated limit price or higher.

Code.Name: MAKT
Code.Description: Order to buy or sell a specified amount of a financial instrument at the quoted market price or better.

Code.Name: MANH
Code.Description: Order to buy or sell a specified amount of a financial instrument at the quoted market price or better with some discretion on the price limit.

Code.Name: MTLO
Code.Description: Type of order that couples the high possibility of execution (Market Order) with a protection against unwanted price fluctuations (Limit Order).

Code.Name: MUTO
Code.Description: Order to buy or sell a specified amount of a financial instrument at the quoted market price or better with some discretion on the price limit.

Code.Name: NOHE
Code.Description: Order that may be executed in partials or outside the hours of the exchange or other exchange rules.

Code.Name: ORLI
Code.Description: Order that is related to another order where the second order may be cancelled without cancelling the first. Normally, the sell order must be executed before the buy order.

Code.Name: SLOS
Code.Description: Order to sell that sets the sell price below the market price.

Code.Name: SPLU
Code.Description: Order to sell a stated amount provided that the price is not lower than the last sale price if the last sale was a plus or zero plus tick and not lower than the last sale minus the minimum fractional change in the financial instrument if the last sale was a minus or zero minus tick.

Code.Name: SSEX
Code.Description: Order to sell short which is exempt from short-sale rules.

Code.Name: SSHO
Code.Description: Order to sell a financial instrument that the seller does not own; a sale effected by delivering a financial instrument borrowed by or for the account of the seller.

Code.Name: STLI
Code.Description: Stop order to buy (sell) that becomes a limit order at the limit price when the financial instrument trades at or above (below) the stop price after the order is submitted.

Code.Name: STOP
Code.Description: Order to buy that becomes a market order when the financial instrument trades at or above the stop price after the order is submitted or an order to sell which becomes a market order when the financial instrument trades at or below the stop price.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is TRTR and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BASK
Code.Description: Transaction is a single order to buy and sell several financial instruments for the purpose of simultaneous buying and selling. Baskets are often used for a set of 15 or more financial instruments and play a role in arbitrage activity.

Code.Name: INDX
Code.Description: Transaction is a single order to buy or sell all underlying financial instruments of an index, e.g., S&P500.

Code.Name: LIST
Code.Description: Transaction is a trade of a predetermined set of financial instruments.

Code.Name: PROG
Code.Description: Transaction relates to computer-driven automatically executed trades in large volumes of a set of several financial instruments.

Code.Name: TRAD
Code.Description: Transaction is a regular trade.

Validation.Comment: In option F, if Qualifier is TTCO and Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: BLKO
Code.Description: Trade is a block trade, allocation instructions will follow.

Code.Name: BTEX
Code.Description: Trade to be executed at best execution.

Code.Name: CALL
Code.Description: Trade to be executed following the exercise of a call option on the security.

Code.Name: CBNS
Code.Description: Trade executed cum bonus.

Code.Name: CCPN
Code.Description: Trade executed cum coupon.

Code.Name: CDIV
Code.Description: Trade executed cum dividend.

Code.Name: CLBR
Code.Description: Trade to be executed for closure of a previous position before the rollover of a position (Deferred Settlement Service).

Code.Name: CLEN
Code.Description: Trade is to be executed clean, ie, does not pay government tax on the accrued interest on the bond, and consequently price is higher.

Code.Name: CRST
Code.Description: Cross trades are allowed whereby buy and sell orders are offset without recording the trade on the exchange.

Code.Name: CRTS
Code.Description: Trade is to be executed cum rights.

Code.Name: CWAR
Code.Description: Trade is to be executed cum warrants.

Code.Name: DIOR
Code.Description: Trade is to be executed with a specific trading party.

Code.Name: DIRT
Code.Description: Trade is to be executed dirty, ie, pay government tax on the accrued interest of the bond

Code.Name: DORD
Code.Description: Trade is to be executed by a trading party other than the trading party to which the order is sent. In this case, the instructing party has traded with another broker which will subsequently send an advice of execution to the executing party.

Code.Name: FORW
Code.Description: Trade is based on forward price. Price will be calculated after the close of the dealing period.

Code.Name: FRAC
Code.Description: Fractional parts allowed.

Code.Name: GTDL
Code.Description: Delivery of the financial instrument on settlement date is guaranteed.

Code.Name: HIST
Code.Description: Trade is based on historic price.

Code.Name: MONT
Code.Description: Trade to be executed for month-end settlement (Deferred Settlement Service).

Code.Name: NBFR
Code.Description: Trade to be executed for a new trade position on the next month following the rollover of a position (Deferred Settlement Service).

Code.Name: NCRS
Code.Description: No cross trade allowed.

Code.Name: PUTT
Code.Description: Trade to be executed following the exercise of a put option on the security.

Code.Name: SPCU
Code.Description: Trade is executed with a special cum dividend, i.e., buying after the ex date and getting the dividend.

Code.Name: SPEX
Code.Description: Trade is executed with a special ex dividend, i.e., selling before the ex date without the coupon.

Code.Name: TRFR
Code.Description: Trade to be executed on the next month following the rollover of positions.

Code.Name: XBNS
Code.Description: Trade is to be executed ex bonus.

Code.Name: XCPN
Code.Description: Trade is to be executed ex coupon.

Code.Name: XDIV
Code.Description: Trade is to be executed ex dividend.

Code.Name: XRTS
Code.Description: Trade is to be executed ex rights.

Code.Name: XWAR
Code.Description: Trade is to be executed ex warrants.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .

Option.Name: S
Option.Specification: (Qualifier) (Data Source Scheme) (Type of ID) (Country Code) (Alternate ID)

Validation.Qualifiers: BRCR, BUYR, CLBR, INBR, INVE, RQBR, SELL, STBR
Validation.Comment: Name and Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26).

Validation.Qualifiers: BRCR, BUYR, CLBR, INBR, INVE, RQBR, SELL, STBR
Validation.Comment: Proprietary code (Format Option R), Alternate ID (Format Option S) and Name and Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26).

Alternate ID (Format Option S) must not start or end with a slash '/' and must not contain two consecutive slashes '//' . For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26).

Validation.Qualifiers: BRCR, BUYR, CLBR, INBR, INVE, RQBR, SELL, STBR
Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45).
Country Code must be a valid ISO country code (Error code(s): T73).
In option S, if Qualifier is ALTE and Data Source Scheme is not present, Type of ID must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K95):

Code.Name: ARNU
Code.Description: Number assigned by a government agency to identify foreign nationals.

Code.Name: CCPT
Code.Description: Number assigned by a passport authority.

Code.Name: CHTY
Code.Description: Number assigned to a tax exempt entity.

Code.Name: CORP
Code.Description: Number assigned to a corporate entity.

Code.Name: DRLC
Code.Description: Number assigned to a driver's licence.

Code.Name: FIIN
Code.Description: Number assigned to a foreign investor (other than the alien number).

Code.Name: TXID
Code.Description: Number assigned by a tax authority to an entity.

Validation.Comment: In option B, when Data Source Scheme is not present, Account Type Code must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K97) :

Code.Name: ABRD
Code.Description: Financial instruments are held in a safekeeping account abroad.

Code.Name: CEND
Code.Description: Financial instrument in the safekeeping account are held in one location.

Code.Name: DVPA
Code.Description: Safekeeping account is used for settlement on delivery or collect on delivery basis.

Code.Name: FUNG
Code.Description: Financial instruments in the safekeeping account are fungible.

Code.Name: MARG
Code.Description: Account is used when financing is by the broker/dealer.

Code.Name: NFUN
Code.Description: Financial instruments in the safekeeping account are not fungible.

Code.Name: PHYS
Code.Description: Financial instruments in the safekeeping account are in physical form.

Code.Name: SHOR
Code.Description: Account is used for short sale orders.

Validation.Comment: Date must be a valid date expressed as YYYYMMDD (Error code(s): T50) .
Time must be a valid time expressed as HHMMSS (Error code(s): T38) .
Reference must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//' (Error code(s): T26) .
If Data Source Scheme is not present, Indicator must contain one of the following codes (Error code(s): K22) :

Code.Name: AGEN
Code.Description: Party is trading on behalf of his client.

Code.Name: BAGN
Code.DetailedName: Acting as Agent for Customer and Other Person
Code.Description: Party is acting as an agent for both customer and another person.

Code.Name: CAGN
Code.Description: Party is crossing on behalf of his client.

Code.Name: CPRN
Code.Description: Party is crossing for his own account.

Code.Name: OAGN
Code.DetailedName: Acting as Agent for Person Other than Customer.
Code.Description: Party is acting as an agent for a person other than a customer.

Code.Name: PRAG
Code.DetailedName: Acting as Agent for Some Executions and Principal
Code.Description: Party is acting as an agent for some executions and principal for others.

Code.Name: PRIN
Code.Description: Party is trading for his own account.

Validation.Comment: Identifier Code must be a registered BIC or BEI (Error code(s): T27,T28,T29,T45)

Proprietary code (Format Option R) and Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

Proprietary code (Format Option R) and Name & Address (Format Option Q) must not start or end with a slash '/' and not contain two consecutive slashes '//'. For field formats with more than 1 line, the rule applies for each line (Error code(s): T26) .

fieldvalidation.name: U09
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "User has used tag 119 in a message that is not a candidate for special processing"

fieldvalidation.name: U12
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "When populating an end-to-end reference, both fields 111 and 121 must be populated: a message that contains only one of these two fields will not be accepted by FIN."

fieldvalidation.name: U03
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Invalid format! Format must be 'xxxxxxxx-xxxx-4xxx-yxxx-xxxxxxxxxxxx' where x is any hexadecimal character (lower case only) and y is one of 8, 9, a, or b."

fieldvalidation.name: C1
fieldvalidation.comment: C1 If the Activity Flag (field :17B:ACTI) in sequence A General Information is N, then sequence B must not be present. Otherwise, sequence B is mandatory (Error code(s): E66).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the Activity Flag (field :17B:ACTI) in sequence A General Information is N, then sequence B must not be present. Otherwise, sequence B is mandatory"

fieldvalidation.name: C2
fieldvalidation.comment: C2 The Safekeeping Account (field :97a::SAFE) must be identified in sequence A General Information, or in all occurrences of subsequence B2c Trading Parties, but not in both (Error code(s): E67).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "The Safekeeping Account (field :97a::SAFE) must be identified in sequence A General Information, or in all occurrences of subsequence B2c Trading Parties, but not in both."

fieldvalidation.name: C3
fieldvalidation.comment: C3 If the message is a cancellation, ie, Function of the Message (field 23G) is CANC, then subsequence A1 (Linkages) must be present at least once in the message, and in one and only one occurrence of A1, field :20C::PREV must be present; consequently, in all other occurrences of A1, field :20C::PREV is not allowed (Error code(s): E08).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "If the message is a cancellation, ie, Function of the Message (field 23G) is CANC, then subsequence A1 (Linkages) must be present at least once in the message, and in one and only one occurrence of A1, field :20C::PREV must be present; consequently, in all other occurrences of A1, field :20C::PREV is not allowed."

fieldvalidation.name: C4
fieldvalidation.comment: C4 In each occurrence of subsequence B2, either an ordered quantity (field :36B::ORDR) or an ordered amount (field :19A::ORDR) must be present, but not both; in addition, if field 36B is present then field 19A must not be present, and vice versa if field 19A is present then field 36B must not be present (Error code(s): E58).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of subsequence B2, either an ordered quantity (field :36B::ORDR) or an ordered amount (field :19A::ORDR) must be present, but not both; in addition, if field 36B is present then field 19A must not be present, and vice versa if field 19A is present then field 36B must not be present"

fieldvalidation.name: C5
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In sequence A, if field :95L::ALTE is present, then field :95a::ACOW must be present."

fieldvalidation.name: C6
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "In each occurrence of subsequence B2c, field :95a::ALTE must not be present more than twice. When repeated, one and only one occurrence must be with format option L (:95L::ALTE)."

fieldvalidation.name: FB-35B-B
fieldvalidation.comment: FB-35B-B ISIN is used at the beginning of Identification of Security (Subfield 1) and must be composed of uppercase letters only (Error code(s): T12).
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: B.F35B.Identification_Of_Security + " is not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c"

fieldvalidation.name: FB-35B-B1
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Not a valid Security Identification. Required format is ISIN1!e12!c";

fieldvalidation.name: FB1-90a-A
fieldvalidation.formula: Implies($value.INDC.$size > 0 && IsNotNull($value.INDC[0].Sign), IsNotNull($value.INDC[0].Percentage_Type_Code) && $value.INDC[0].Percentage_Type_Code == "YIEL") && Implies($value.MRKT.$size > 0 && IsNotNull($value.MRKT[0].Sign), IsNotNull($value.MRKT[0].Percentage_Type_Code) && $value.MRKT[0].Percentage_Type_Code == "YIEL") && Implies($value.EXER.$size > 0 && IsNotNull($value.EXER[0].Sign), IsNotNull($value.EXER[0].Percentage_Type_Code) && $value.EXER[0].Percentage_Type_Code == "YIEL")
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Sign may only be present if Percentage Type Code is YIEL."

fieldvalidation.name: FB2b-90a-A
fieldvalidation.formula: Implies($value.DEAL.$size > 0 && IsNotNull($value.DEAL[0].Sign), IsNotNull($value.DEAL[0].Percentage_Type_Code) && $value.DEAL[0].Percentage_Type_Code == "YIEL") && Implies($value.STOP.$size > 0 && IsNotNull($value.STOP[0].Sign), IsNotNull($value.STOP[0].Percentage_Type_Code) && $value.STOP[0].Percentage_Type_Code == "YIEL") && Implies($value.LIMI.$size > 0 && IsNotNull($value.LIMI[0].Sign), IsNotNull($value.LIMI[0].Percentage_Type_Code) && $value.LIMI[0].Percentage_Type_Code == "YIEL")
fieldvalidation.actionmessage: "Sign may only be present if Percentage Type Code is YIEL."
